foreignData.name: Orakel von Mul Daya
foreignData.text:
Du darfst ein zusätzliches Land während jedes deiner Züge ausspielen.
Die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ist offen.
Du kannst die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek spielen, falls es ein Land ist.

foreignData.name: Oráculo Mul Daya
foreignData.text:
Puedes jugar una tierra adicional en cada uno de tus turnos.
Juega mostrando la primera carta de tu biblioteca.
Puedes jugar la primera carta de tu biblioteca si es una carta de tierra.

foreignData.name: Oracle de Mul Daya
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez jouer un terrain supplémentaire pendant chacun de vos tours.
Jouez avec la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque révélée.
Vous pouvez jouer la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque si c'est une carte de terrain.

foreignData.name: Oracolo di Mul Daya
foreignData.text:
Puoi giocare una terra addizionale in ognuno dei tuoi turni.
Gioca con la prima carta del tuo grimorio rivelata.
Puoi giocare la prima carta del tuo grimorio se è una carta terra.

foreignData.name: ムル・ダヤの巫女
foreignData.text:
あなたは自分の各ターンに、追加の土地を１つプレイしてもよい。
あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開したままプレイする。
あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードが土地カードである場合、あなたはそれをプレイしてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・シャーマン

foreignData.name: Oráculo de Mul Daya
foreignData.text:
Você pode jogar um terreno adicional em cada um de seus turnos.
Jogue com o card do topo de seu grimório revelado.
Você pode jogar o card do topo de seu grimório se ele for um card de terreno.

foreignData.name: Оракул Племени Мул Дайя
foreignData.text:
Вы можете разыгрывать одну дополнительную землю в каждом из ваших ходов.
Играйте с открытой верхней картой вашей библиотеки.
Вы можете разыграть верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки, если это карта земли.

foreignData.name: 慕达雅先知
foreignData.text:
你在自己的每回合中可以额外使用一个地。
你以展示牌库顶牌的方式进行对战。
如果你的牌库顶牌是地牌，则你可以使用它。

name: Oracle of Mul Daya
originalText:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card.

rulings.text: If you control more than one Oracle of Mul Daya, the effects of their first abilities are cumulative. If you control two, for example, you can play three lands on your turn.

Oracle of Mul Daya doesn’t change the times when you can play a land card from the top of your library. You can play a land only during your main phase when you have priority and the stack is empty. Doing so counts as one of your land plays for the turn.
If you play your first land of the turn from the top of your library, and the new top card is another land card, you can play that one too.
The top card of your library isn’t in your hand, so you can’t suspend it, cycle it, discard it, or activate any of its activated abilities.
If the top card of your library changes while you’re casting a spell, playing a land, or activating an ability, the new top card won’t be revealed until you finish doing so.
When playing with the top card of your library revealed, if an effect tells you to draw several cards, reveal each one before you draw it.

text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play lands from the top of your library.
